Real Time

November 2009

The Real Time Web will build the surface, the complete and shiny sphere of the Digital Universe.

Augmented Reality will be the border of these two worlds.

Knowledge will still come by involution from books and blogs and will stay hidden under the surface.

In technology, values, real time, augmented reality, knowledge.
The Second Law
